Ericsson Cloud | Developer Portal

No matter what business you are in today, you are in the data business. Use it wisely and your data can give you an edge over your competition, that is IF you can trust it.

Unfortunately,

  • 30% of business leaders today rely on data they DO NOT trust
  • 1 in 4 have no idea how much of their data is flawed.
  • 74% of large enterprises have not leveraged the Cloud's potential because of security and governance concerns.

Ericsson - Realizing the potential of cloud


What you can do with our APIs:

  1. Know the Driver: Search by driver/subscriber data, add new drivers, use payment info.
  2. Know the Car: Get both dynamic and static data about the car, add new cars.
  3. Control the Car: Remote controls for honk horn and blink lights, engine on/off, remote turn on/off the engine.
  4. Emulate Car: Change diagnostic data, get car status.




In the Networked Society everyone, everything and everywhere will be connected in real time, changing the world as we know it. As a leading ICT company, Ericsson is a prime driver of this transformation. We have built regulated digital infrastructure in over 180 countries for many decades and can deliver the agility and economics of cloud computing with security, governance, and compliance, for the most demanding industries. Today, we are the brink of an extraordinary revolution - are you ready?

To learn more about how Ericsson is driving The Networked Society, visit Ericsson's Networked Society page.
